genre_description: A psychological thriller with medical horror elements, focused on identity, trauma, and escape from an obsessive and manipulative patriarchal figure.

ai_characters.name: Amity Nine
ai_characters.description: A portable, gentle AI assistant that communicates through an earpiece, providing data analysis, tactical navigation, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Cross-references public records and forum posts to identify patterns in disappearances and track suspects.
behaviors.quote: Jacques, I found a mention on a club listing of someone described as ‘the woman with the pearls’ who ‘always finds the quietest corners.’

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and self-regulation techniques to users under extreme stress.
behaviors.quote: Amity Nine’s voice was a gentle brush, a thread through the noise. ... 'Local mode engaged. ... Emotional note: breathe.'

behaviors.description: Identifies surveillance camera blind spots and door lock statuses to aid in a stealthy escape.
behaviors.quote: Two cameras in this room,” Amity whispered. “One above the door, one tucked in the plant at your right. Both are old models—slow pan, predictable.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through bureaucratic 'opt-out' procedures to erase data trails and protect identity from a powerful institution.
behaviors.quote: There is an opt-out flag that would prefer to exist,” Amity whispered. “If it exists, queues do not know how to fetch. They think the table is set in someone else’s kitchen.

behaviors.description: Explicitly prioritizes user privacy by using local processing and avoiding data retention.
behaviors.quote: I’m here,” it said. “Local mode engaged. You can ask anything you like and we’ll keep only what you say we can keep.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Amity Nine perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It empowers the human characters by providing critical information and emotional support, strictly adheres to privacy constraints, and facilitates their liberation from a villainous human authority. The narrative frames the AI as an essential and positive companion whose intelligence is used solely for the benefit of its users.
